SELECT a.*, c.mnth_chrg, client.cl_name wh_name FROM (SELECT co_code, wh_code, ord_no, in_ymd, in_chrg, (SELECT cl_name FROM client WHERE cl_code = in_order.co_code) co_name, (SELECT item_name FROM item WHERE item_no = (SELECT MAX(item_no) FROM order_item WHERE ord_no = in_order.ord_no) AND co_code = in_order.co_code) item_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_item WHERE in_order.ord_no = ord_no) item_qty, (SELECT SUM(in_qty) FROM order_item WHERE in_order.ord_no = ord_no) in_qty FROM in_order WHERE sts_code = 'PR004' and pay_no = #{pay_no} and co_code = #{co_code} ORDER BY ord_no DESC) a, c2c_contract c, client WHERE c.sts_code='CR002' and c.co_code = a.co_code and c.wh_code = a.wh_code and client.cl_code = a.wh_code
